name: Honda City Hybrid eHEV
description: The price of Honda City Hybrid, a 5 seater Sedan, ranges from Rs. 19.04  - 20.59 Lakh. It is available in 3 variants, with an engine of 1498 cc and a choice of 1 transmission: Automatic. City Hybrid eHEV comes with 6 airbags. Honda City Hybrid is available in 6 colours. Users have reported a mileage of 27.1 kmpl for City Hybrid.

variants.variant_name: City Hybrid eHEV V 1498 cc, Hybrid (Electric + Petrol), Automatic (e-CVT), 27.1 kmpl, 97 bhp
City Hybrid eHEV ZX 1498 cc, Hybrid (Electric + Petrol), Automatic (e-CVT), 27.1 kmpl, 97 bhp
City Hybrid eHEV ZX 2024 1498 cc, Hybrid (Electric + Petrol), Automatic (e-CVT), 27.1 kmpl, 97 bhp
